definition: Akihabara, region of downtown Tokyo famous for electronics stores

sentences.english: I saw one in Akihabara yesterday for twice the RRP .
sentences.chinese: 我看到一個在秋葉原昨天兩倍釋出。

sentences.english: These shops attract many otaku, and forms unique culture of Akihabara.
sentences.chinese: 吸引了大量的御宅族，形成了獨特的秋葉原文化。

sentences.english: Tourists from China stand outside a Laox Co shop in the Akihabara district of Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 中國遊客站在東京秋葉原區一家樂購思商場前。

sentences.english: He should just pop down Akiba and buy professionally shot magazine of this stuff.
sentences.chinese: 這傢伙應該直接去秋葉原買這類東西的專業拍攝雜誌。

definition: Matsushima (name)/Matsushima town and national park in Miyagi prefecture, Japan
Nagano (name)/Nagano city and prefecture in central Japan
Lanshan district of Rizhao city 日照市[Ri4 zhao4 shi4], Shandong
Kōbe, major Japanese port near Ōsaka
Hakodate, main port of south Hokkaidō 北海道[Bei3 hai3 dao4], Japan
Kangshan town in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan/Okayama prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
Ginkakuji or Silver pavilion in northeast Kyōto 京都, Japan/officially called Jishōji 慈照寺[Ci2 zhao4 si4]
